titles: A replie to a censure written against the two answers to a Iesuites seditious pamphlet. By William Charke
Replie to a censure written against the two answers to a Jesuites seditious pamphlet.
author: Charke, William, d. 1617.
publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: A reply by Charke to Robert Parsons's "A briefe censure uppon two bookes written in answere to M. Edmonde Campions offer of disputation".
Running title reads: A replie to the censure.
In two settings. In the copy catalogued leaf B2 recto, line 8 ends "re-".
Reproduction of the original in the New York Public Library, New York City.
keywords: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610. --  Briefe censure uppon two bookes written in answere to M. Edmonde Campions offer of disputation --  Early works to 1800.
Jesuits --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
